idea-plugin.name: Local Productivity Statistics
idea-plugin.description:
The Local Productivity Statistics plugin gathers local statistics on your machine on how IDE is used.

For the purpose of Local Productivity Statistics plugin, no data are transferred from your computer, and the database is not shared or synchronized with any remote storage or third-party service. JetBrains does not have access to your personal data created in the IDEs. For more information on data protection, please click here: https://www.jetbrains.com/legal/docs/privacy/privacy/
